sentences.sContent: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
sentences.sCn: 布雷利先生被告知需要绝对保密。

sentences.sContent: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.sCn: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

sentences.sContent: ...being aware of your self-expectation with a clear future blueprint lays a foundation for this important decision...
...what will business owners do when they become aware of the benefits of the internet of things...
...A lot of times people are not really aware of the impact they have...
...I soon became aware that campaigning is useless...
...are beginning to emerge in this bruising environment: Americans are becoming aware of the toll their jobs take on them...
...I became aware of the trials of career-focused European women a few years ago when I met a post-doctoral student from Germany who was then a visiting fellow at Johns Hopkins...
...We need to be aware of the risks and keep working to alleviate the dangers...
...The more you are aware of your weak points/weaknesses...
...If the employees were already aware of their deficiencies before the evaluation period...
...Universities are increasingly aware that they must adapt to a rapidly changing world in order to...

synos.tran: 意识到的；知道的；有…方面知识的；懂世故的

trans.tranOther: if you are aware that a situation exists, you realize or know that it exists
